data.comment: The match is underway at Hillsborough Stadium.
Garry Monk (Sheffield Wed) is making a first substitution, with Liam Palmer replacing Liam Shaw.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Hillsborough Stadium.
Garry Monk is making the team's second substitution at Hillsborough Stadium with Moses Odubajo replacing Liam Palmer.
In the minute 52, Callum Paterson (Sheffield Wed) has received a yellow card from Michael Salisbury.
It's now 1-0 thanks to an own goal from Yoann Barbet.
QPR make their first substitution with Macauley Bonne replacing Tom Carroll.
In the minute 63, Sheffield Wed's Massimo Luongo has been booked in Sheffield.
Joey Pelupessy is on a sub for Fisayo Dele-Bashiru for Sheffield Wed.
Dominic Ball is replacing Luke Amos for QPR at Hillsborough Stadium.
In the minute 77, At Hillsborough Stadium, Yoann Barbet has been yellow-carded for the away team.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Macauley Bonne gets an equalizer for QPR. The score is now 1-1.
